body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Where To Stay & Where To Eat From 1942-1945 Minidoka was Idaho's 7th largest city. Today, however, Minidoka National Historic Site  has no overnight accommodations or restaurants. Below are links to nearby communities where you can find more information to plan your visit.    Eden, ID –10 miles Eden Lodging and Restaurants Jerome, ID – 16 miles Jerome Lodging and Restaurants Twin Falls, ID – 21 miles Twin Falls Lodging and Restaurants  Latest information about visiting Southern Idaho.
title: Minidoka National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
